title: 1317: The 8 Best Butt Building Exercises You Are Not Doing
description:
In this episode, Sal, Adam & Justin discuss the advantages of eight highly effective and rarely done butt building exercises.

  • How JLo made big butts great again. (3:02)
  • What separates us from primates. (4:58)
  • The 8 Best Butt Exercises You are NOT Doing. (6:02)
    • #1 – The Sumo Deadlift. (7:26)
    • #2 – Cossack Squat. (12:37)
    • #3 – Single-Leg Deadlift. (16:19)
    • #4 – Single-Leg Stand Up. (20:48)
    • #5 – Single-Leg Hip Thrust. (24:21)
    • #6 – The Sled Drive. (28:50)
    • #7 – The Goblet Squat. (33:36)
    • #8 – The Back-Step Lunge. (35:35)
